name: Yizhou Wang 0001
content: Center on Frontiers of Computing Studies,Peking University People People Directors Faculty Visiting Chair Professors Visiting Faculty Postdocs Visiting Scholars Graduate Students Alumni Staff Join us Home > People > Faculty > Yizhou Wang People Directors Faculty Visiting Chair Professors Visiting Faculty Postdocs Visiting Scholars Graduate Students Alumni Staff Join us Faculty Yizhou Wang Affiliated Professor +86 (0)10 6276-0759 yizhou.wang Room 202-2, Courtyard No.5, Jingyuan Computer Vision, Cognitive Computing, Medical Image Analysis, Computational Aesthetics Yizhou Wang More Bio-Sketch Yizhou Wang, Endowed Boya Professor, Vice Director of CFCS at Peking University. He received his Bachelor's degree in Electrical Engineering from Tsinghua University in 1996, and his Ph.D. in Computer Science from University of California at Los Angeles (UCLA) in 2005. He joined Xerox Palo Alto Research Center (Xerox PARC) as a research staff from 2005 to 2007. Dr. Wang has published over 200 papers and obtained a number of best paper awards. His research interests include computational vision, cognitive computing,  medical image analysis, and computational arts. More Selected Publications 2025 1.
